io.spine.server.entity

Class EntityMessageEndpoint<I,E extends Entity<I,?>,M extends io.spine.core.ActorMessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.EntityMessageEndpoint<I,E,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of entity IDs
    E - the type of entities
    M - the type of message envelopes
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PmCommandEndpoint, PmEventEndpoint, ProjectionEndpoint

    @Internal
public abstract class EntityMessageEndpoint<I,E extends Entity<I,?>,M extends io.spine.core.ActorMessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base for endpoints handling messages sent to entities.

    Loading and storing an entity is a tenant-sensitive operation, which must be performed under the context of the tenant ID in which the message we dispatch was originated.

        public void dispatchTo(I entityId)
        Dispatches the message to the entity with the passed ID according to the delivery strategy.
        Parameters:

      • deliverNowTo

        protected abstract void deliverNowTo(I entityId)
        Dispatches the message to the entity with the passed ID, providing transactional work and storage of the entity.

        Performs the delivery directly to the entity not taking the delivery strategy into account.

        Parameters:
        entityId - the ID of the entity which to dispatch the message to

      • onUnhandledCommand

        protected void onUnhandledCommand(Entity<I,?> entity,
                                  io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope cmd,
                                  java.lang.String format)
        Throws IllegalStateException with the diagnostics message on the unhandled command.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity which failed to handle the command
        cmd - the envelope with the command
        format - the format string with the following parameters
        1. the name of the entity class
        2. the ID of the entity
        3. the name of the command class
        4. the ID of the command
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - always
